node.title: Sonic Boom - All Things Being Equal
node.description: Pete Kember's new album sounds like a mix of Kraftwerk and Animal Collective. it is the first Sonic Boom album after Spectrum, which was released in 1989. in the meantime, the former Spacemen 3 member produced and collaborated with bands like MGMT, Beach House or Panda Bear and released music as Spectrum or E.A.R. (Experimental Audio Research).
node.release: All Things Being Equal was released on Carpark Records on June 6, 2020.
